body.name: GRAPENT Capri Pants for Women High Waisted Wide Leg Linen Palazzo Trousers Pull On Elastic Smock Waist Loose Flowy Pants
features: The elastic high waist of the beach pants for women can have a smoothing and tummy control effect. It gently hugs the midsection, providing a bit of compression and helping to create a flatter appearance.

Side pockets of loose pants for women summer add a practical element to capri pants. They allow you to carry essential items with you without the need for a separate bag or constantly reaching into your back pockets. The placement of the pockets on the sides ensures that the items stay secure and close at hand.

Our linen pants for women high waist with wide leg design provide a relaxed and comfortable fit. The loose-fitting nature of the wide legs allows for ease of movement and breathability, keeping you cool and comfortable in warm weather. They offer a more relaxed alternative to form-fitting pants, making them suitable for casual and laid-back occasions.

The womans pants are suitable for daily wear, casual outings, beach, resort, summer parties, shopping, travel, etc. These capri pants are made of soft, skin-friendly and breathable linen fabric. No stretch.

GRAPENT capri for women run true to standard US sizes. Size Small fits size 4 to size 6, Size Medium fits size 8 to size 10, Size Large fits size 12 to size 14, Size X-Large fits size 16 to size 18, Size XX-Large fits size 20 to size 22.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Embrace the freedom of movement with our wide leg capris pants The wide leg design of these linen pants women capri pants, offers a relaxed and flowy silhouette, allowing for ease of movement. The elastic waistband of our capri pants provides a comfortable and customizable fit, ensuring you feel at ease while looking fabulous.

Experience the perfect blend of style and comfort in our linen capri pants Capri pants for women with elastic waist and wide leg design, womens linen pants are a comfortable and stylish choice for warm weather. Crafted with a breathable and lightweight linen fabric, these wide leg pants are the perfect choice for those hot summer days.

Upgrade your wardrobe with our must-have elastic waist linen capris pants Size Reference: Size Small fits size 4 to 6, Medium fits size 8 to 10, Large fits size 12 to 14, X-Large fits size 16 to 18, XX-Large fits size 20 to 22.

Stay cool, comfortable, and stylish with our linen wide leg capri pants Our elastic waist pants for women capri pants are made from premium linen fabric that ensures excellent breathability and lightweight comfort. With the wide leg design, our linen capri pants offer a stylish and relaxed silhouette.

Effortless chic: Our linen capris are a fashion essential Previous page Next page These capri pants are a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Dress them up with a blouse and heels for a chic and polished look or pair them with a casual top and sandals for a laid-back vibe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Cute and Comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for the perfect vacation pants, you found them! These are super comfortable and travel well. They are lightweight and breathable which makes them perfect for warm climates. The included pics are straight from the package. Once I steamed them, the wrinkles were history and didn’t return. I ordered coffee and love the color. It is a great alternative to black - still neutral and match with any color. I am a petite frame and although the length is longer on me than the model, the pants still look great. I can wear them with a wedge heel for dressier looks or flats/sneakers for casual looks and either way is fantastic. I ordered a medium and they are true to size. If you don’t like wearing shorts, these flowy pants will keep you cool even in the hottest weather. I originally ordered them for vacation, but they have worked their way into my office wardrobe. These pants are super versatile for year round wear and I am so glad I gave them a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these! Perfect for warmer weather!
reviews.reviewText: Living in Florida I really wanted some casual throw on pants like this as I don't always want to live in shorts or leggings so these seemed perfect and they are! I am on the shorter side, being 5'3 so sometimes I feel like they are channeling my inner coastal grandma- but huneh!!! These are so comfortable and I could careless how I look in them! Has a nice stretchy waistband and wide leg. I'm pear shaped so hips are big for me and pants can be hard to find, but these fit so perfectly and actually seemed to flatter in my opinion. They aren't see through thin but thin enough to get a good air flow and keep you cool in the warmer months. Love the variety of colors so I'm definitely looking into more. I almost want to say you could possibly size down, but they may be a little snug if you do so. I would recommend these- especially if you live near a coast or visit often these are perfect to throw over a swimsuit when it isn't exactly blazing hot. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Casual capris with beach-y fabric; a little prone to wedgies
reviews.reviewText: I got these capris pants so that I'd have some casual summer capris in a fun color.SIZE/FIT: I got an XXL in the olive green, and they fit as expected (the waist is a little snug on me, but I knew that going in, since I have a 42" waist - but they're pretty comfortable and stretchy regardless). I'm 5"6', about 220 lbs. The capris pant stops about 5-6 inches above my ankle.APPEARANCE: I love the color of the fabric; it's a lovely, light, slightly muted green. I like how the capris look from the front and sides. On the backside, however, the fabric kept getting caught up on my behind, giving my a slight wedgie appearance. For that reason, I took off a star.FEATURES: These pants have nice sized, open pockets, big enough for a phone or wallet. I like the wide, elastic waist.FUNCTION/FABRIC: The fabric of these pants is light and kind of crinkled; they would be great for the beach or on a hot summer day.Overall, I'm very happy with these pants, aside from the wedgie issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was nervous about these for two reasons: I thought they would look too dowdy/matronly on me, and that they wouldn’t have good stretch. I was wrong on both counts! With the right styling, I think these pants will look really chic. The fabric is super nice - a light linen quality, but with a decent amount of stretch to offer so much comfort. They do appear to wrinkle easily, but the fabric is light enough that wrinkles should easily come out with a quick steam.I typically wear size 14/16 in pants and got an XL in these and it fits great - I am more “pear shaped” so I can have a hard time finding things that fit my curves, but these pants passed the test! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little small
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality pants. The material is light and flowy, very comfortable. Unfortunately they run a little small. Elastic tends to be more forgiving, but I would have sized up one for a comfortable fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice stretch, fabric flows nicely, good fit
reviews.reviewText: I’ve recently started to update my wardrobe and came across these pants. They looked great in the pictures and once they arrived, I wasn’t disappointed by how the fabric and cut looked on me. And they have nicely sized pockets!Sewing and material seem great so far, and after washing I didn’t notice any shrinkage. There is no stretch to the fabric, but the loose fit allows for a comfortable wear without feeling constrained or the pants riding up. The waist, however, is a bit elastic, so even when sitting down, the pants aren’t tight.Love them so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy!
reviews.reviewText: The pants are very comfortable to wear. They are made of soft flowy fabric ideal for summers. They are very lightweight and the length is also not long. I ordered the brown color and it looks nice just as in the picture. The waistband is smooth and not too tight and it also comes with side pockets.The fabric is soft linen and does not get wrinkly. I think they will look nice to wear at the beachside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the short person!
reviews.reviewText: These are a nice pair of palazzo pants. They are not too thin or see through. They have pockets. And the length is just perfect not going past my ankles with the right fit in a size small. For reference, I am 5ft 2 in, 120-125 lbs, athletic build, and size small/x-small fits me best. So, do order true to size. All the stitching and sewing was done well with no open seams, overlapping of material or loose hanging thread. I do recommend these pants. They are perfect for spring/summer wear.
